<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get all blueprints"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/blueprints"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch all blueprints in your Port account.<br/><br/>To learn more about blueprints, check out the [documentation](https://docs.port.io/build-your-software-catalog/customize-integrations/configure-data-model/setup-blueprint/).

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Default Response"}}}

</StatusCodes>
